name: 128k - a detective game
description:
Search an old 128k Macintosh to find the hidden password, 
using real world Google and emails.


The HTML5 port is a bit buggy, especially when it comes to surfaces.
It's created with an old engine. Sorry about that.
Download the game for a better experience! 

IMPORTANT:
Make sure that your email account
allows mail from “canned responses”.
If you are uncertain, you can use a
trash email account. I recommend 
https://www.guerrillamail.com/
This game is not playable if the bot isn’t
allowed to respond to your emails.

Please consider supporting my next game on Kickstarter!

Atomograd
